title: Delta Ditto

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose another player at night. The host will choose another role from the roles thread that is the closest approximation of their role, not counting faction, and you will become that role but you keep this ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Morph into another role and win as it.

desc:
Post 243
*When rearranging its cell structure to transform itself, it sometimes makes a mistake and becomes a different type.*
